Sentencas: Oxygen-ion conducting solid electrolyte systems have been reviewed with specific emphasis on their use in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conducting Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The relationships between phase assemblage, electrolyte stability and ionic conductivity have been discussed.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conducting Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The role of parameters such as sintering temperature and atmosphere which influence the segregation of impurities, present in the starting ceramic powders, at grain boundaries and at the external surface of the electrolyte compacts has been emphasised.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conducting Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The stability of various electrolyte materials in contact with other fuel cell components and in fuel environments has been discussed in detail.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conducting Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The ageing behaviour at fuel cell operating temperatures has been described.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conducting Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Data on ionic conductivity, mechanical and thermal properties have been presented for a number of electrolyte materials.
Titulo: Oxygen-Ion Conducting Electrolyte Materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
